entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 7:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 95 %

Dewpoint: -0.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
